author: kahatlen
msg: DERBY-1443: DataTypeDescriptor.isBinaryType() return false for Types.BLOB
Adding javadoc for isBinaryType() and isCharacterType() clarifying why
they return false for BLOB and CLOB.

author: jorton
msg: remove assumption that $@ is preserved forever - it never was in any
autoconf release; autoconf 2.60 happens to overwrite it earlier.
